content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The passport

fields.headline: The passport
fields.bodyText: Frequent travellers or those heading off on a gap year to lots of different countries may find it worthwhile to get the new 'jumbo' passport, which has 16 extra pages in it. The 'Biometric 48 Page Passport' is identical to the standard one except in size, and is 'biometric' because, like all new UK passports, it incorporates measurement data from the holder's facial photo. It costs £77, compared with £66 for the standard size, and is available from tomorrow from www.passport.gov.uk.
